arts.ttl: Steven Gerrard facing increased Al-Ettifaq pressure after Al Hilal defeat but former Rangers boss sends defiant message
arts.sum: The former Ibrox gaffer watched his side lose once again as they drop to 11th in the Saudi Pro League standings

arts.ttl: Brazil and Barcelona legend Neymar 'eager to rejoin former club' following Saudi injury hell
arts.sum: Neymar is reportedly pushing ahead with a return to his former club Santos after suffering another injury setback with Al-Hilal.

arts.ttl: Ronaldo to REPLACE Neymar?, Mbappe DROPPED, Barcelona TARGET Salah: FootballTransfers Recap
arts.sum: Ronaldo to REPLACE Neymar?, Mbappe DROPPED, Barcelona TARGET Salah: FootballTransfers Recap Liverpool make January transfer call over three stars

arts.ttl: Barcelona Sets Historic Record Eclipsing Heights of Messi, Suarez, Neymar
arts.sum: Barcelona has scored 55 goals in its first 16 matches across all competitions for the first time in club history.

arts.ttl: Neymar's Al Hilal Contract Situation Could Pave Way for Inter Miami Transfer
arts.sum: Brazilian star Neymar could be out of contract this winter and potentially join MLS club Inter Miami.

arts.ttl: Al-Hilal line up superstar Neymar replacement: Cristiano Ronaldo and Mohamed Salah transfer targets
arts.sum: Saudi Pro League side Al-Hilal are prepared to release Neymar at the end of his contract in June, but they are lining up a world-class replacement for the former PSG star, with Liverpool ’s Mohamed Salah and Al-Nassr ’s Cristiano Ronaldo both subject of interest. Saudi media report that they are lining up a sensational offer for Ronaldo, who has been prolific in the Pro League since moving to Al-Nassr as a free agent shortly after the 2022 World Cup, having been released by Manchester United at that point.

arts.ttl: Neymar's huge Saudi Arabia contract 'could be terminated' as new injury layoff confirmed
arts.sum: Neymar has suffered another injury setback as his Saudi Arabia nightmare continues with Al-Hilal considering getting the Brazilian off their books come January

arts.ttl: Preview: Al-Hilal vs. Al Ettifaq - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Saudi Pro League clash between Al-Hilal and Al Ettifaq, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Neymar Al-Hilal future in doubt as Saudi side consider shock Cristiano Ronaldo transfer
arts.sum: Al-Hilal’s patience with Neymar is running out. The Saudi club invested huge sums into the Brazilian when they signed him from PSG nearly 18 months ago. Things have not gone to plan though. Despite being one of the Pro League’s highest-profile players, Neymar has barely featured for Al-Hilal. arts.ttl: Neymar out 4-6 weeks, Al Hilal future in doubt
arts.sum: Neymar is expected to undergo treatment and rehabilitation lasting four to six weeks after suffering a hamstring injury.
